entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore had died, which is the reason Harry must say what he has known he must say.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is Harry's girlfriend whom he wants to stop seeing due to danger from Voldemort.

relationships.description: Harry must say what he has known he must say ever since Dumbledore had died.
Voldemort uses people his enemies are close to, and Ginny will be in danger if she keeps seeing Harry.
